mapper.select: SELECT A.BLG_NO , A.BLG_NAME , A.BLG_PRI , A.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , B.SPR_END_DATE , A.PJT_NO , A.BLG_DEL_YN , A.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , A.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM BACKLOG A JOIN SPRINT B ON(A.BLG_NO = B.BLG_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo} AND B.SPR_END_DATE < SYSDATE

SELECT D.RNUM , D.BLG_NO , D.BLG_NAME , D.BLG_PRI , D.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , D.SPR_END_DATE , D.PJT_NO , D.BLG_DEL_YN , D.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , D.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , C.BLG_NO , C.BLG_NAME , C.BLG_PRI , C.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , C.SPR_END_DATE , C.PJT_NO , C.BLG_DEL_YN , C.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , C.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM (SELECT A.BLG_NO , A.BLG_NAME , A.BLG_PRI , A.BLG_ENROLL_DATE , B.SPR_END_DATE , A.PJT_NO , A.BLG_DEL_YN , A.BLG_DEMO_MEMO , A.BLG_REF_MEMO FROM BACKLOG A JOIN SPRINT B ON(A.BLG_NO = B.BLG_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo} AND B.SPR_END_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY B.SPR_END_DATE DESC ) C ) D WHERE D.RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT A.PJT_NO , A.PJT_NAME , A.PJT_START_DATE , A.PJT_DEL_YN , A.PJT_END_DATE , A.PJT_COLOR FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo}
SELECT A.PA_ROLE , A.PJT_NO , A.MEM_NO , A.PA_NO , B.MEM_ID FROM PJT_AUTHORITY A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.PJT_NO = #{pjtNo}
SELECT A.MEM_NO FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{email}

INSERT INTO PROJECT_HISTORY A ( A.PJT_NO, A.PJT_NAME, A.PJT_START_DATE, A.PJT_END_DATE , A.UPDATE_DATE, A.PJT_DEL_YN, A.PJT_HIS_NO, A.PJT_COLOR ) VALUES ( #{pjtNo}, #{projectName}, #{projectStartDate},#{projectEndDate} , SYSDATE, 'N', SEQ_PJT_HIS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{projectColor} )
